extendedInfo.description: Have lots of passwords to remember? Feeling hard to choose suitable password? try Password Master.* Strong encryption and saved locally. Only your phone can decode on the planet* Password management and query* Password generation* Expiration notifications* Passwords backup & restore

reviews.comment: No response from developer on serious bug.  Liked it at first but cannot recommend it now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Developer needs to fix bugs
reviews.comment: This app would easily be a 4 or 5 if not for the fact that the developer has some pretty serious bugs, which should be pretty simple to fix, but he\'s ignored them.  Until bugs are fixed DO NOT purchase this app.  It\'s pretty much a useless app right now due to bugs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SH!T PROGRAM
reviews.comment: !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!**ATTENTION**!!!!!!!!!!!!! DOES NOT SAVE PASSWORDS. ALL VALUES ARE \"NULL\" VERY INCONSISTENT AND UNRELIABLE!! DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME. TERRIBLE PROGRAMING. I WANT MY PASSWORDS BACK NOW AND MONEY. PURE RIP OFF. DO NOT DOWNLOAD DO NOT DOWNLOAD DO NOT DOWNLOAD DO NOT DOWNLOAD DO NOT DOWNLOAD DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Resets account information - NOT USABLE
reviews.comment: I am having the same problem others have been having - the program resets my account name to the same this as my description.  Also a month ago, it reset all my passwords to \'NULL\', and I had to re-enter them all.  They seem to be staying intact for now, but I can\'t change the account back to what it should be.  I have had this app for a couple of years, and really liked it.  But the last couple of months have been bad.  Perhaps the latest update caused a massive problem, which is a shame.  I can not recommend this app, as it fails at its primary function - storing account info.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lost all my passwords after a month.Many other problems but not doing that one thing its supposed to is a deal breaker Poorly written app..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I complained before about null passwords but that issue was being caused by me changing roms. Developer gave me a refund but I have repurchased
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but buggy
reviews.comment: When you change the Account name and save, it always changes the Account name to whatever\'s in Description. Makes it pretty much useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Im having problems now, the Name and Account Name are the same. Whatever i change the account to it changes back to the Name and Account Name the same
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It keeps changing my account name to the description name. It is very irritating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Solid app. Needs more icons for type of accts and more room in the notes section.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Upgrading from the trial version to the paid version doesn\'t save your passwords. This is incredibly annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Suddenly lost all passwords. I had several backups, none of them restored my passwords! HTC Incredible Android 2.2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app. Best one ive found thus far. Love hoe you can email all your info to yourself for added protections.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Randomly lost all passwords and accounts. All backups were gone too. Worse than not having a password app. DO NOT USE!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be helpful if the fields could be made more flexible
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Passwords gone. Saved several in it and now they all just show as null.

reviews.comment: Great app. Motor droid

reviews.comment: all passwords got wiped out suddenly one day without apparent reason

reviews.comment: Excellent app! Easy to use, and very handy!
